name: knightrider-syntax

1.0.2.name: knightrider-syntax
1.0.2.description: Knightrider 80s syntax theme for Atom inspired by and based on the Farzher Neon Sublime Text 2/3 theme, using CSS text-shadow to implement the glow effect based on the neon-syntax package
